attributes.action: The Government should stop the Daily publication of Covid statistics.
attributes.additional_details: The continued publication of Covid deaths is an extension of "project fear". Reducing non Covid deaths is now the priority.
attributes.background: The Government should concentrate on publishing non Covid deaths.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want the Government to publish non-Covid daily deaths instead of Covid-related deaths, or not to publish any such statistics. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
